segment.source: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard-Shortcut Locations Dialog Box
segment.target: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard-Shortcut Locations Dialog Box

segment.source: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard-Shortcut Locations Dialog Box
segment.target: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard-Shortcut Locations Dialog Box

segment.source: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard-Shortcut Locations Dialog Box
segment.target: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard-Shortcut Locations Dialog Box

segment.source: Use the Shortcut Locations dialog box to specify where to publish application shortcuts on the Application Virtualization Desktop Client.
segment.target: Use the Shortcut Locations dialog box to specify where to publish application shortcuts on the Application Virtualization Desktop Client.

segment.source: This dialog box is found on the Configure Applications page of the Sequencing Wizard and contains the following elements.
segment.target: This dialog box is found on the Configure Applications page of the Sequencing Wizard and contains the following elements.

segment.source: Select to publish the application shortcut to the Application Virtualization Desktop Client.
segment.target: Select to publish the application shortcut to the Application Virtualization Desktop Client.

segment.source: Select to publish the application shortcut to the Send To menu.
segment.target: Select to publish the application shortcut to the Send To menu.

segment.source: Select to publish the application shortcut to the Quick Launch toolbar.
segment.target: Select to publish the application shortcut to the Quick Launch toolbar.

segment.source: Select to publish the application shortcuts to a designated subfolder of the Start menu.
segment.target: Select to publish the application shortcuts to a designated subfolder of the Start menu.

segment.source: Click to publish application shortcuts to additional locations.
segment.target: Click to publish application shortcuts to additional locations.
